item.description:
It's freezing outside, why should you come out?

*Because we're bringing Sexy back*
*Because we're gonna party like it's your birthday*
*Because we want to see your one-two step... so show us what you got!*

So why should you come out? Because this night is gonna be HOT.

Details: Meeting time is 8:30pm at Miracle of Science Bar (321 Massachusetts Ave), which is right next to the lounge. We will head over to Middlesex at 9:30pm sharp to beat the lines. Please meet us before 9:30pm, as you may not find us later. Cover: $5.

Find the organizer: My picture is located to the left - I will be wearing a grey scarf for the evening. For help/questions, my cell: 646.541.0708.

(Middlesex is located between Central Square and MIT)

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Drop It Like It's HOT @ Middlesex Lounge, Friday 2/23
